constituent: open sea, water, water droplets, water pistol, in, stick, mouth
heisigStory: This kanji could hardly be simpler. The key word open sea readily suggests being out in the middle of a great body of water .Thinking of it in this way should avoid confusion with the kanji for "open," which we will meet later on.
koohiiStory1: Open sea is a lot of water in the middle of nowhere.
koohiiStory2: Water in the middle of the ocean is referred to as open sea.
kunYomi: おき、おきつ、ちゅう.する、わく
myStory: cửa biển. nơi bắt đầu vào vùng xung quanh là nước
